metadata.title: CVE-2009-3606 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Integer overflow in the PSOutputDev::doImageL1Sep function in Xpdf before 3.02pl4, and Poppler 0.x, as used in kdegraphics KPDF, might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted PDF document that triggers a heap-based buffer overflow.

notes.note: mdeslaur> poppler fixes this with the gmallocn cleanups in CVE-2009-3605

criterions.comment: ipe package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
libextractor package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
